LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Exalted.stages.0.label: did dumb labor
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Exalted.stages.0.descripti: I had to do dumb labor. I am an excellent example of the working class.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Liked.stages.0.label: did dumb labor
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Liked.stages.0.description: I had to do dumb labor. Broke a sweat but it was some honest work.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Disliked.stages.0.label: did dumb labor
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Disliked.stages.0.descript: I had to do dumb labor. So exhausting!
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Horrible.stages.0.label: did dumb labor
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Horrible.stages.0.descript: I had to do dumb labor. It’s horrible. I don’t want it.
